txt.en: Tortrygg is concerned with the invasion of Norbar by the Orcs.

'You are a friend to us, little one? Then hear me, Tortrygg of Norbar. Evil Fire-orcs came from the surface world to conquer us and unleash the Great Evil. They kill us, we kill them...it does not end.

'I ask you to help us end this war. Help us to drive back the Fire-Orcs. If you can slay Narnûlubat and Zogtark, two of the leaders of the Ghâshfra, the Fire-orcs, the others might leave.

'Will you help us? Narnûlubat and Zogtark may be found within Noruidor.'
Narnûlubat and Zogtark can be found within Noruidor.\n\nTortrygg has asked to you to find and defeat two of the leaders of the Ghâshfra, Narnûlubat and Zogtark.
'You are a mighty warrior, little one. You are deserving of this reward, though I fear your success was not enough to drive away the Ghâshfra.'
Tortrygg is at the Eldgang camp within the Rift of Nûrz Ghâshu.\n\nYou should return to Tortrygg with news of your victory against Narnûlubat and Zogtark.
'Evil things invade our home...help us to defeat them, [placeholder].'
